name: Side-Scrolling Shenanigans
description:
first game made on godot, just testing how uploading stuff works, game quite basic, automatic shooting, avoid asteroids, keep going as far as you can. 

Play using arrow keys, right arrow key boost, up and down to move.

Credit to David Fesliyan for the music and Ray Larabie for the fonts. Last but not least Dr Alimazing for doing the drawing as well as his endless support.
